parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2oa

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.51

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Camera Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Set camera shake parameters. 
Will not have any effect until shake is started via [[addCamShake]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''setCamShakeParams'''  [posCoef, vertCoef, horzCoef, bankCoef, interpolation]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> posCoef: [[Number]] - Strength of positional movement (how far the whole position can change in X,Y&Z), should not be bigger than .1, or the camera might move into, or behind, the player

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> vertCoef: [[Number]] - Strength of vertical camera pan (up/down), practical range: 0-10

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> horzCoef: [[Number]] - Strength of horizontal camera pan (left/right), practical range: 0-10
</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> bankCoef: [[Number]] - Strength of camera tilt/bank, practical range: 0-20
</value></part><part><name>p5</name>=<value> interpolation: [[Boolean]] - If [[true]], then transitions in the different shaking directions will be smoother

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[setCamShakeParams]] [0.1, 1, 1, 1, true]; </code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setCamShakeDefParams]], [[addCamShake]], [[enableCamShake]], [[resetCamShake]]
</value></part></template>

[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
